pageProduct.name: Trilogy Cream Cleanser 100ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Trilogy's certified natural Cream Cleanser is a gentle everyday cleanser that thoroughly removes daily impurities and make-up from the face and eyes without drying complexions.

This simple one-step cleanser is packed with the goodness of pure plant rosehip, evening primrose and carrot oils, and works to leave skin feeling smoother, softer and refreshed.

Suitable for all skin types including drier skin types.

Key Benefits:
- Cleanses without drying
- Removes impurities and make-up
- Non-drying

Common Uses

Softens, smooths and cleanses complexions with a velvety, pure plant oil enriched formulation.

Ingredients

Aqua (Water), Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Glycerin (Vegetable), Rosa Canina (Rosehip) Seed Oil, Cetearyl Olivate (and) Sorbitan Olivate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Oenothera Biennis (Evening Primrose) Seed Oil, Hydrogenated Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Tocopheryl Acetate (vitamin E), Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe Vera) Leaf Extract, Daucus Carota Sativa (Carrot) Seed Oil, Chamomilla Recutita Matricaria (chamomile) Flower Extract, Citrus Aurantium Amara (Bitter Orange) Flower Oil, Xanthan Gum, Citric Acid, Dehydroacetic Acid (and) Benzyl Alcohol, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Parfum, Citral, Geraniol, Citronellol, Limonene, Linalool, Dehydroacetic Acid (and) Benzyl Alcohol

Directions

Gently massage onto damp skin on face, neck and décolletage. Tissue off or rinse with warm water (using a face cloth for best results). Use daily or as often as required.
